item.description:
D&D Encounters

Storm Over Neverwinter 

 

Adventure Background: Storm Over Neverwinter

The frontier city of Neverwinter has persevered in the face of calamity. Yet even as the city rebuilds, an insidious threat rises from within its walls. Neverwinter’s citizens are succumbing to an inexplicable madness, while from the shadows, an evil cult of Asmodeus spins sinister plans. Unless a group of heroes rises to stop these perils, Neverwinter might face an even greater danger on the horizon.

This D&D Encounters season takes characters from levels 3-6.

 

For this coming season you need to either create a 3rd level character of any official 4th edition Living Forgotten Realms (LFR) race and class or you may bring in your character that you played in the older Neverwinter Encounter season. Each character will have 3 magic items. One each of levels 4, 3 and 2 or lower levels and 680 gold to spend on other items, only two of which may be consumable. It is extremely important that you try to make use of a character theme based in Neverwinter. If you have played through the previous Neverwinter campaign you may use that character and if he or she made it to level 4, you may play that character starting at level 4.

The materials needed to join us for this encounters season are your character sheets, a set of dice and a miniature figure to represent yourself. If you do not have a figure we will try to have something that you can use for the session. The store also requires a $3.00 session fee.

Hope to see you!
item.name: D&D Encounters - Storm Over Neverwinter
